scenes.description: Title card for Ceres Fauna's 3D showcase.
Ceres Fauna walks through a beautiful 3D forest while humming and singing a variation of 'Ring-a-ring-o' roses'.
Ceres Fauna greets the audience and introduces her 3D showcase in her forest home.
Ceres Fauna takes pose requests from the audience, including attempting the splits and delivering 'slaps'.
Ceres Fauna showcases various features of her 3D forest, including a fountain, the World Tree, a bench, and a gazebo.

subtitles.original:
3D SHOWCASE
#3DKirin
Ceres Fauna
subtitles.english:
3D SHOWCASE
#3DKirin
Ceres Fauna

subtitles.original:
Ring-a-ring-o' roses, fa-la-la-la,
round and round, fa-la-la-la,
subtitles.english:
Ring-a-ring-o' roses, fa-la-la-la,
round and round, fa-la-la-la,

subtitles.original:
jumping up and down, fa-la-la-la,
koko ni... te...
subtitles.english:

here I... am...

subtitles.original: Hey, aren't you here early?
subtitles.english: Hey, aren't you here early?

subtitles.original: Wait, or perhaps am I late?
subtitles.english: Wait, or perhaps am I late?

subtitles.original: Welcome to my 3D showcase, everyone!
subtitles.english: Welcome to my 3D showcase, everyone!

subtitles.original: Thank you for showing up right on time.
subtitles.english: Thank you for showing up right on time.

subtitles.original: I'm ready, I promise, I'm ready.
subtitles.english: I'm ready, I promise, I'm ready.

subtitles.original: We have a lot of fun stuff planned for today.
subtitles.english: We have a lot of fun stuff planned for today.

subtitles.original: It means a lot to me that you came to see me.
subtitles.english: It means a lot to me that you came to see me.

subtitles.original: Here I am, in 3D, for you!
subtitles.english: Here I am, in 3D, for you!

subtitles.original: I have a lot to show off today,
subtitles.english: I have a lot to show off today,

subtitles.original: including myself, but also this beautiful forest,
subtitles.english: including myself, but also this beautiful forest,

subtitles.original: to which I call home, which I can finally show to you.
subtitles.english: to which I call home, which I can finally show to you.

subtitles.original: I'm excited!
subtitles.english: I'm excited!

subtitles.original: And if you're also excited and you want to talk about the stream,
subtitles.english: And if you're also excited and you want to talk about the stream,

subtitles.original: feel free to post with the hashtag #3DKirin,
subtitles.english: feel free to post with the hashtag #3DKirin,

subtitles.original: which you can see on the screen somewhere.
subtitles.english: which you can see on the screen somewhere.

subtitles.original: And while I'm here for you in 3D,
subtitles.english: And while I'm here for you in 3D,

subtitles.original: do you have any pose requests you would like to see from me?
subtitles.english: do you have any pose requests you would like to see from me?

subtitles.original: I'm taking your requests right now, so you better get them in while you can.
subtitles.english: I'm taking your requests right now, so you better get them in while you can.

subtitles.original: What do you think? What do you think?
subtitles.english: What do you think? What do you think?

subtitles.original: I'm in a generous mood right now. I just might even do the splits for you.
subtitles.english: I'm in a generous mood right now. I just might even do the splits for you.

subtitles.original: Don't think I've forgotten. I remember. I remember.
subtitles.english: Don't think I've forgotten. I remember. I remember.

subtitles.original: You want to see? Okay, I said I was generous, but...
subtitles.english: You want to see? Okay, I said I was generous, but...

subtitles.original: ...but am I really so generous? I don't know.
subtitles.english: ...but am I really so generous? I don't know.

subtitles.original: Splits? Is there a way to do the splits in a, a ladylike manner?
subtitles.english: Splits? Is there a way to do the splits in a, a ladylike manner?

subtitles.original: Well, there's two methods. You can, you can go this way.
subtitles.english: Well, there's two methods. You can, you can go this way.

subtitles.original: That's more of a lunge. Or you can go this way.
subtitles.english: That's more of a lunge. Or you can go this way.

subtitles.original: Maybe, maybe we scrap that one.
subtitles.english: Maybe, maybe we scrap that one.

subtitles.original: Do you have any idol-like pose requests for me?
subtitles.english: Do you have any idol-like pose requests for me?

subtitles.original: Mermaid pose? No.
subtitles.english: Mermaid pose? No.

subtitles.original: I'm not doing mermaid pose. No mermaid pose.
subtitles.english: I'm not doing mermaid pose. No mermaid pose.

subtitles.original: A slap. You want to be slapped.
subtitles.english: A slap. You want to be slapped.

subtitles.original: I shouldn't be surprised at this point.
subtitles.english: I shouldn't be surprised at this point.

subtitles.original: All right, come here. Come here.
subtitles.english: All right, come here. Come here.

subtitles.original: Hoo-cha!
subtitles.english: Hoo-cha!

subtitles.original:
You want another one? You want another one?
That wasn't enough for you?
subtitles.english:
You want another one? You want another one?
That wasn't enough for you?

subtitles.original: Hoo-cha!
subtitles.english: Hoo-cha!

subtitles.original: All right, all right. I think that was enough of that.
subtitles.english: All right, all right. I think that was enough of that.

subtitles.original: Let me show you around a little bit.
subtitles.english: Let me show you around a little bit.

subtitles.original: Hopefully you're not too, too dazed from the slaps.
subtitles.english: Hopefully you're not too, too dazed from the slaps.

subtitles.original: We have in my lovely forest many features,
subtitles.english: We have in my lovely forest many features,

subtitles.original: such as a fountain. Perfect ASMR ambiance.
subtitles.english: such as a fountain. Perfect ASMR ambiance.

subtitles.original: Lots of bubbles. Mm-hm.
subtitles.english: Lots of bubbles. Mm-hm.

subtitles.original: Not only do we have a fountain... well, first of all,
subtitles.english: Not only do we have a fountain... well, first of all,

subtitles.original: there are so many beautiful flowers around.
subtitles.english: there are so many beautiful flowers around.

subtitles.original: And this giant tree! The World Tree has finally been complete.
subtitles.english: And this giant tree! The World Tree has finally been complete.

subtitles.original: I built it. I built it myself. I did that.
subtitles.english: I built it. I built it myself. I did that.

subtitles.original: I'm nature. I did that.
subtitles.english: I'm nature. I did that.

subtitles.original: We also have a bench. Beautiful feature.
subtitles.english: We also have a bench. Beautiful feature.

subtitles.original: And a gazebo! How many hit points do you think this thing has?
subtitles.english: And a gazebo! How many hit points do you think this thing has?

subtitles.original: I bet it wouldn't even flinch if I hit it with an arrow. Very scary.
subtitles.english: I bet it wouldn't even flinch if I hit it with an arrow. Very scary.
